name: Warriors Art Dungeon
description:
Warriors Art Dungeon is a prototype NFT Top Down Dungeon Crawler with Metafab elements, designed specifically for the $10,000 On-Chain Jam.

Unfortunately, there was not enough time to finish the development of the game, now it has registration on the metafab, a dungeon and the opening and spawning of chests from the issuance of currency

Lyralein and Exzimon worked on the project

Management guide:

ESC - pause

WASD - movement

F - chest opening
